overview: Pete Mauro is a Product Management executive with 15 years experience bringing web, social media, mobile and PC products to market. He founded Startup Partners in 2011 to help entrepreneurs build successful businesses. Prior to that he headed up product at Savings.com. Prior to Savings.com, Pete co-founded SceneTag, a social media company dedicated to creating the largest online collection of movie and TV quotes. Previously he managed product development and content licensing for Warner Bros. Mobile. Prior to that, Pete launched consumer products for several early stage tech startups including Event411.com and Cloud 9 Interactive. During his career, Pete has worked with popular entertainment brands and properties such as Looney Tunes, Harry Potter, The Matrix, The OC, DC Comics, Marvel Comics, Nickelodeon and Disney.
